title: Sound On: The Legacy of Rumsfeld and Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: The Legacy of Rumsfeld and Infrastructure
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Cathy Hackl, Tech Futurist, talks Crypto and its influence on markets Katia Dmitrieva, Bloomberg News reporter, on markets and inflation Rose Pierre-Louis, NYU McSilver Institute COO, on Ranked Choice Voting plus NYC Mayoral Race Rep. Don Beyer, Chair of the Joint Economic Committee on infrastructure, Jan. 6 Commission Vote

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
